improvement.name: Enable Special Attribute
improvement.altpage: Libera os controles de um atributo, permitindo que os valores sejam aumentados. Valores esperados são MAG, RES, ou DEP para Magia, Ressonância e Profundidade respectivamente.

improvement.name: Attribute
improvement.altpage: Ajusta os valores para um dos Atributos do personagem. Número positivos aumentam um Atributo. Número negativos diminuem um Atributo. Selecione um Atributo para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. Valor ajusta o valor atual do Atributo. Mínimo ajusta o valor mínimo do Metatipo para o Atributo. Máximo ajusta o valor máximo do Metatipo para o Atributo. Valores máximos ampliados por Metatipo são ajustado automaticamente baseados no novo máximo do Metatipo. Campos podem ser deixados em 0 se você não deseja afetar aquele aspecto específico de um Atributo.

improvement.name: Replace Attribute
improvement.altpage: Sobrepõe as limitações do Metatipo para um atributo. Mínimo ajusta o valor mínimo do Metatipo para o Atributo. Máximo ajusta o valor máximo do Metatipo para o Atributo. Valores máximos ampliados por Metatipo são ajustado automaticamente baseados no novo máximo do Metatipo.

improvement.name: Enable Spells and Spirits Tab
improvement.translate: Habilitar Aba de Feitiços e Espíritos
improvement.altpage: Habilita a aba Feitiços e Espíritos do personagem, permitindo que ele compre feitiços e vincule espíritos. O personagem é marcado como um Mago para fins de requisitos de qualidades, mas não recebe acesso à aba de Iniciação, destrava seu atributo Magia ou recebe qualquer uma das perícias Mágicas. Incompátivel com melhorias que habilitam a aba de Formas Complexas e Sprites.

improvement.name: Enable Technomancer Tab
improvement.altpage: Habilita a aba 'Formas Complexas e Sprites' do personagem, permitindo que ele compre Formas Complexas e compile Sprites. O personagem é marcado como um Tecnomante para fins de requisitos de qualidades, mas não recebe acesso à aba de Submersão, destrava seu atributo Ressonância ou recebe qualquer uma das perícias de Ressonância. Incompátivel com melhorias que habilitam a aba de Feitiços e Espíritos.

improvement.name: Enable Initiation/Submersion Tab
improvement.altpage: Habilita a aba Poderes de Adepto do personagem, permitindo que ele compre feitiços e vincule espíritos. O personagem recebe acesso à aba de Iniciação, ou de Submersão para Tecnomantes.

improvement.name: Enable Critter Tab
improvement.altpage: Habilita a aba Poderes de Criaturas do personagem, permitindo que ele compre poderes de criaturas. O personagem é marcado com uma Criatura.

improvement.name: Cyber-Singularity Seeker/Redliner (Attribute)
improvement.altpage: Concede bônus para o atributo especificado baseado no número de cibermembros que o personagem tem. Atributos especiais são inválidos.

improvement.name: Cyber-Singularity Seeker/Redliner (Condition Monitor)
improvement.translate: Buscador da Cibersingularidade/No Máximo (Monitor de Condição)
improvement.altpage: Concede bônus para o Monitor de Condição física do personagem baseado no número de cibermembros que ele tem. Veja No Máximo (Redliner) em Chrome Flesh para mais detalhes.

improvement.name: Condition Monitor, Physical
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de caixas que o personagem tem em seu Monitor de Condição Física. Números positivos aumentam o número de caixas no Monitor Condição. Números negativos reduzem o número de caixas no Monitor de Condição.

improvement.name: Condition Monitor, Stun
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de caixas que o personagem tem em seu Monitor de Condição de Atordoamento. Números positivos aumentam o número de caixas no Monitor Condição. Números negativos reduzem o número de caixas no Monitor de Condição.

improvement.name: Condition Monitor, Threshold
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de caixas entre cada Limiar do Monitor de Condição. Números positivos aumentam o número de caixas entre cada Limiar. Números negativos reduzem o número de caixas entre cada Limiar.

improvement.name: Condition Monitor, Threshold Offset
improvement.translate: Monitor de Condição, Deslocamento de Limiar
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de caixas entre o ínicio de cada Monitor de Condição e o primeiro Limiar. Números positivos aumentam a posição inicial do primeiro Limiar. Números negativos reduzem a posição inicial de cada Limiar.

improvement.name: Block Skillgroup Defaulting
improvement.translate: Bloquear Teste-padrão de Grupo de Perícias
improvement.altpage: Impede o personagem de ver valores de pilhas de dados para perícias no grupo de perícias selecionado.

improvement.name: Attribute Level
improvement.altpage: Soma ao Valor base do atributo selecionado, aumentando os custos de Carma para compras subsequentes.

improvement.name: Skill Level
improvement.altpage: Soma ao Valor base da perícia selecionada, aumentando os custos de Carma para compras subsequentes.

improvement.name: KnowSoft
improvement.altpage: Cria uma Perícia de Conhecimento que exige a melhoria de acesso de periciasoft para ser ativada.

improvement.name: Adept Power
improvement.altpage: Cria um Poder de Adepto gratuito. Se o pode selecionado já existe, o poder será marcado como gratuito ou terá níveis gratuitos adicionados a ele.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Firewall
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Firewall da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Firewall. Números negativos reduzem o Firewall. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Skill
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de uma das Perícias do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam a Perícia. Números negativos diminuem a Perícia. Selecione uma Perícia para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. O modificador pode ser aplicado para o Nível da Perícia selecionando Aplicar ao Nível, do contrário o modificador é aplicado como um modificador de pilha de dados.

improvement.name: Skills in Category
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de todas as Perícias de uma categoria pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam as Perícias. Números negativos diminuem as Perícias. Selecione a categoria de Perícia para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. O modificador pode ser aplicado para o Nível da Perícia selecionando Aplicar ao Nível, do contrário o modificador é aplicado como um modificador de pilha de dados.

improvement.name: Skills in Group
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de todas as Perícias de um Grupo de Perícias pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam as Perícias. Números negativos diminuem as Perícias. Selecione o Grupo de Perícias para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. O modificador pode ser aplicado para o Nível da Perícia selecionando Aplicar ao Nível, do contrário o modificador é aplicado como um modificador de pilha de dados.

improvement.name: Skills linked to Attribute
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de todas as Perícias conectadas a um Atributo pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam as Perícias. Números negativos diminuem as Perícias. Selecione um Atributo conectado para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. O modificador pode ser aplicado para o Nível da Perícia selecionando Aplicar ao Nível, do contrário o modificador é aplicado como um modificador de pilha de dados.

improvement.name: Armor, Ballistic
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Nível de Armadura Balística do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram a Armadura Balística. Números negativos reduzem a Armadura Balística.

improvement.name: Armor, Impact
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Nível de Armadura de Impacto do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram a Armadura de Impacto. Números negativos reduzem a Armadura de Impacto.

improvement.name: Reach
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Alcance do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o Alcance. Números negativos reduzem o Alcance.

improvement.name: Unarmed DV
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Valor de Dano para os Ataques Desarmados do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o Valor de Dano. Números negativos diminuem o Valor de Dano.

improvement.name: Unarmed DV Physical
improvement.altpage: Todos os Ataques Desarmados do personagem causarão dano Físico em vez de dano de Atordoamento.

improvement.name: Unarmed AP
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de Penetração de Armadura para os Ataques Desarmados do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos reduzem a Penetração de Armadura. Números negativos aumentam a Penetração de Armadura.

improvement.name: Initiative
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a Iniciativa do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam a Iniciativa. Números negativos reduzem a Iniciativa.

improvement.name: Initiative Dice
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de Dados de Iniciativa o personagem recebe pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o número de Dados de Iniciativa. Números negativos reduzem o número de Dados de Iniciativa.

improvement.name: Matrix Initiative
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a Iniciativa da Matriz do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam a Iniciativa da Matriz. Números negativos reduzem a Iniciativa da Matriz.

improvement.name: Matrix Initiative Passes
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de Passos de Iniciativa da Matriz do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o número de Passos de Iniciativa da Matriz. Números negativos reduzem o número de Passos de Iniciativa da Matriz.

improvement.name: Lifestyle Cost
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo de Neoiene para todos os Estilos de Vida pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os Estilos de Vida agora custarão X% adicional por mês. Números positivos aumentam o custo mensal em Neoienes do Estilo de Vida. Números negativos reduzem o custo mental em Neoienes do Estilo de Vida.

improvement.name: Genetech Cost
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo de Biônicos nas categorias de Genetecnologia pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os custos de Genetecnologia em Neoienes agora custarão X% do seu valor original. Números menores que 100 reduzem o custo em Neoienes. Números maiores que 100 aumentam o custo em Neoienes.

improvement.name: Basic Bioware Essence Cost
improvement.translate: Custo de Essência de Biônicos Básicos
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo de Essência de Biônicos na categoria Básica pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os custos de Essência de Biônicos Básicos agora custarão X% do seu valor original. Números menores que 100 reduzem o custo de Essência. Números maiores que 100 aumentam o custo de Essência.

improvement.name: Bioware Essence Cost
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo de Essência de Biônicos pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os custos de Essência de Biônicos agora custarão X% do seu valor original. Números menores que 100 reduzem o custo de Essência. Números maiores que 100 aumentam o custo de Essência.

improvement.name: Cyberware Essence Cost
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo de Essência de Cibernéticos pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os custos de Essência de Cibernéticos agora custarão X% do seu valor original. Números menores que 100 reduzem o custo de Essência. Números maiores que 100 aumentam o custo de Essência.

improvement.name: Weapon Category DV
improvement.altpage: Ajuda o Valor de Dano de todas as Armas na categoria selecionada pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o Valor de Dano das Armas. Números negativos diminuem o Valor de Dano das Armas.

improvement.name: Power Points, Free Spirit
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de Pontos de Poder que um Espírito Livre recebe para gastar em Poderes de Criatura pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o número de Pontos de Poder. Números negativos reduzem o número de Pontos de Poder. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não são Espíritos Livres.

improvement.name: Power Points, Adept
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o número de Pontos de Poder que um Adepto recebe para gastar em Poderes de Adepto pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o número de Pontos de Poder. Números negativos reduzem o número de Pontos de Poder. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não são Adeptos.

improvement.name: Armor Encumbrance Penalty
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a penalidade de Sobrecarga de Armadura do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam a penalidade de Sobrecarga de Armadura (ruim). Números negativos diminuem a penalidade de Sobrecarga de Armadura (bom).

improvement.name: Damage Resistance
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o tamanho da pilha do Teste de Resistência a Dano do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam o tamanho da pilha. Números negativos diminuem o tamanho da pilha.

improvement.name: Judge Intentions
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Atributo Especial Julgar Intenções pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram Julgar Intenções. Números negativos reduzem Julgar Intenções.

improvement.name: Composure
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Atributo Especial Compostura pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram Compostura. Números negativos reduzem Compostura.

improvement.name: Lift and Carry
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Atributo Especial Erguer/Carregar pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram Erguer/Carregar. Números negativos reduzem Erguer/Carregar.

improvement.name: Memory
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Atributo Especial Memória pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram Memória. Números negativos reduzem Memória.

improvement.name: Concealability
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a habilidade do personagem de ocultar armas pelo valor digitado. Este bônus se aplica a Ocultação de todas as Armas. Valores positivos melhoram a Ocultação. Valores negativos reduzem a Ocultação.

improvement.name: Drain Resistance
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o tamanho da pilha de Resistência ao Dreno do personagem pelo valor digitado. Valores positivos aumentam o tamanho da pilha. Valores negativos diminuem o tamanho da pilha.

improvement.name: Fading Resistance
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o tamanho da pilha de Resistência ao Enfraquecimento do personagem pelo valor digitado. Valores positivos aumentam o tamanho da pilha. Valores negativos diminuem o tamanho da pilha.

improvement.name: Spells in Category
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o tamanho da pilha de Conjuração do personagem quando conjurar Feitiços na categoria selecionada. Valores positivos melhorar a Conjuração. Valores negativos reduzem a Conjuração.

improvement.name: Skillsoft Access
improvement.altpage: O personagem pode usar Periciasofts tipo Conhecisoft e Linguasoft como se ele tivesse uma conexão neural direta.

improvement.name: Essence
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a Essência do personagem pelo valor digitado. Valores positivos aumentam a Essência. Valores negativos diminuem a Essência.

improvement.name: Essence Maximum
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Máximo de Essência do personagem pelo valor digitado. Valores positivos aumentam o Máximo de Essência. Valores negativos diminuem o Máximo de Essência.

improvement.name: Throwing Weapon Range
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a FOR do personagem para fins de determinar a distância de Armas de Arremesso. Números positivos aumentam a FOR efetiva do personagem. Números negativos reduzem a FOR efetiva do personagem.

improvement.name: Skillwire Rating
improvement.altpage: Concede ao personagem acesso a Habilitrônicos no Nível especificado que limita o Nível efetivo de todos os Periciasofts que o personagem pegar.

improvement.name: Swap Skill Attribute (Physical for Mental)
improvement.translate: Trocar Atributo de Perícia (Físico por Mental)
improvement.altpage: Troca o Atributo Físico usado por uma Perícia Ativa pelo o Atributo Mental correspondente como descrito na tabela de Atributos Astrais em SR4 192. (AGI/LOG; COR/VON; REA/INT; FOR/CAR)

improvement.name: Quickening
improvement.altpage: Concede ao personagem acesso a Vivificação da mesma forma que a Metamágica Vivificação.

improvement.name: Basic Lifestyle Cost
improvement.translate: Custo de Estilo de Vida Básico
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o custo em Neoienes de todos os Estilos de Vida básicos pelo valor percentual digitado. Todos os Estilos de Vida básicos agora custarão um adiciona de X% por mês. Estilos de Vida básicos são apenas aqueles encontrados no livro SR4 e não incluem Estilos de Vida Avançados, Esconderijos, ou Abrigos. Números positivos aumentam o custo mensal em Neoienes do Estilo de Vida básico. Números negativos reduzem o custo mensal em Neoienes do Estilo de Vida básico.

improvement.name: Throwing Weapon STR
improvement.altpage: Ajusta a FOR do personagem para fins de determinar o VD de Armas de Arremesso. Números positivos aumentam a FOR efetiva do personagem. Números negativos reduzem a FOR efetiva do personagem.

improvement.name: Knowledge Skill
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o valor de uma das Perícias de Conhecimento do personagem pelo valor digitado. Números positivos aumentam a Perícia de Conhecimento. Números negativos diminuem a Perícia de Conhecimento. Selecione uma Perícia de Conhecimento para afetar clicando no botão Selecionar Valor. O modificador pode ser aplicado ao Nível da Perícia de Conhecimento selecionando Aplicar ao Nível, do contrário o modificador será aplicado como um modificador de pilha de dados.

improvement.name: Ignore Condition Monitor Penalty, Stun
improvement.translate: Ignorar Penalidade do Monitor de Condição, Atordoamento
improvement.altpage: Reduz a Penalidade do Monitor de Condição de Atordoamento do personagem para 0 enquanto a Melhoria estiver ativa.

improvement.name: Ignore Condition Monitor Penalty, Physical
improvement.translate: Ignorar Penalidade do Monitor de Condição, Físico
improvement.altpage: Reduz a Penalidade do Monitor de Condição Física do personagem para 0 enquanto a Melhoria estiver ativa.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Device Rating
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Nível de Dispositivo da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Nível de Dispositivo. Números negativos reduzem o Nível de Dispositivo. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Program Limit
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Limite de Programas da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Limite de Programas. Números negativos reduzem o Limite de Programas. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Attack
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Ataque da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Ataque. Números negativos reduzem o Ataque. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Sleaze
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Subversão da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Subversão. Números negativos reduzem o Subversão. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Living Persona, Data Processing
improvement.altpage: Ajusta o Datagrama da Persona Viva pelo valor digitado. Números positivos melhoram o Datagrama. Números negativos reduzem o Datagrama. Você também pode digitar operações XPath. Isto não tem efeito em personagens que não tem uma Persona Viva.

improvement.name: Street Cred Multiplier
improvement.altpage: Aumenta ou reduz o multiplicador usado para calcular Crédito de Rua.

improvement.name: Bonus Street Cred
improvement.altpage: Aumenta o Crédito de Rua do personagem pelo valor listado.

mentor.altadvantage: +1 die for compiling and registering sprites of any type
mentor.altdisadvantage: Zero-One is the perfection of the code and demands the same from his followers, or at least teaches them a harsh lesson if they fail. Zero-One technomancers must spend 2 points of Edge to negate a glitch or downgrade a critical glitch.

mentor.name: Alias

choice.name: +1 die for Crack spirtes
+1 dice for Sleuth Sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Spoof Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Alias technomancers cannot abide to pay for their lifestyle and must therefore use their abilities to spoof their lifestyle.

mentor.name: Abort

choice.name: +1 dice for dissonant Crack sprites
+1 dice for dissonant Fault sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Crash Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: An Abort technomancer must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to take any other action in cybercombat except for trying to crash his opponent’s software.

mentor.name: Archivist

choice.name: +1 die for Code sprites
+1 die for Data sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice for all Browse Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Technomancers following the Archivist cannot willingly destroy or corrupt data. The technomancer must succeed at a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to purposely delete or corrupt data (or order a sprite to do so).

mentor.name: Architect

choice.name: +1 die for Data sprites
+1 die for Machine sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 die to Edit Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: –1 die to Crash Tests

mentor.name: Babel

choice.name: +1 die for Courier sprites
+1 die for Tutor sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +1 to online Etiquette and Language Tests, +1 die for Courier or Tutor sprites (player must choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: Secrecy is the bane of communication, so Babel technomancers must make a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to encrypt anything.

mentor.name: The Black Hat

choice.name: +1 die for Crack sprites
+1 die for Fault sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Exploit Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Black Hat technomancers have extreme difficulty restraining themselves from hacking into a node that is interesting in any way. The technomancer must succeed in a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to avoid hacking such a system when the opportunity arises.

mentor.name: Cryptome

choice.name: +1 die for Courier sprites
+1 die for Data sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Encryption and Decryption Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Technomancers who follow Cryptome don’t surrender secrets easily and never to unreliable sources. The technomancer must make a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to share a secret or important information with someone he does not completely trust … and such trust is rare.

mentor.name: Daedalus

choice.name: +1 die for Machine sprites
+1 die for Fault sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Hardware Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Technomancers who follow Daedalus tend to interact with the machines on which they are working in an even more subconscious manner than usual. As a result, modifications they make are geared towards someone with their talents and worldview, rather than something that is intuitive to a mundane user or even a non-Daedalus technomancer. Devices built or modified by such technomancers have a more arcane user interface, imposing a –2 modifier on anyone who wants to legitimately use it.

mentor.name: Delphi

choice.name: +1 die for Code sprites
+1 die for Tutor sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice for Analyze Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Delphi technomancers don’t adapt easily to unexpected situations. They must make a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to make any quick decisions in situations they have not planned for.

mentor.name: Disinformation

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Data sprites
+1 die for dissonant Tutor sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +1 die to all test with skills from the Influence skill group
mentor.altdisadvantage: Disinformants must succeed in a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to pass truthful, complete, or non-doctored information via the Matrix to non-dissonant technomancers.

mentor.name: Echelon

choice.name: +1 die for Crack sprites
+1 die for Sleuth sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +1 die to Track and Sniffer Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Echelon followers obsessively work to gather information about what is going on around them. When caught off-guard, without having information they need, or when running blind into a situation, they suffer a –1 dice pool modifier on all actions as long as the situation remains.

mentor.name: Flow

choice.name: +1 die for Code sprites
+1 die for Data sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice for Threading Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: –1 die to Cybercombat Attack Tests

mentor.name: Idoru

choice.name: +1 die for Crack sprites
+1 die for Sleuth sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice on Con Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Idoru followers must succeed in a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to avoid manipulating data in their favor when the opportunity affords.

mentor.name: Intrusion Countermeasure (IC)
mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Matrix Damage Resistance Tests except Fading, +1 die for Paladin sprites
mentor.altdisadvantage: If an IC technomancer fails to protect or guard something he has committed to, or does not achieve a self-chosen goal, he suffers a –1 dice pool modifier on all actions until he atones for the failure.

mentor.name: Jormungand

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Data sprites
+1 die for dissonant Code sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice Corrupt Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Jormungand technomancers are destructive and will take every opportunity to devastate a node by permanently deleting or corrupting its data. They must succeed in a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to leave a node they have hacked into unscathed.

mentor.name: Nemesis

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Fault sprites
+1 die for dissonant Sleuth sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Con Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: A Nemesis technomancer must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to restrain himself from punishing those whom he feels deserve it.

mentor.name: Noise

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Courier sprites
+1 die for dissonant Code sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Threading Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Noise technomancers rely on the buzz of Matrix more so than others, and suffer double the modifiers applied to Matrix and non-Matrix actions when caught in static or dead zones (see p. 210, SR4).

mentor.name: Probe

choice.name: +1 die for Crack sprites
+1 die for Sleuth sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Scan Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Probe technomancers receive a –2 dice penalty when hacking on the fly without probing first.

mentor.name: Pulse
mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice on Matrix Initiative Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: –2 dice on Hacking Tests when not hacking on the fly

mentor.name: Shooter

choice.name: +1 die for Paladin sprites
+1 die for Tank sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Matrix Attack Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: A Shooter technomancer must succeed in a Willpower + Logic (3) Test to retreat from a Matrix fight.

mentor.name: Snuff

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Crack sprites
+1 die for dissonant Sleuth sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to all Sniffer Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Snuff technomancer suffer a –2 dice pool modifier to resisting addiction to BTL or Matrix media.

mentor.name: Tiamat

choice.name: +1 die for dissonant Crack sprites
+1 die for dissonant Tank sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Cybercombat
mentor.altdisadvantage: –1 die to all Hacking Tests

mentor.name: The World Tree

choice.name: +1 die for Code sprites
+1 die for Courier sprites

mentor.altadvantage: +2 dice to Analyze Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: World Tree technomancers are easily distracted by information they find interesting. When faced with new information, unusual data, or phenomena, the technomancer must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to resist dropping his current task to screen, analyze, and acquire the information (if possible).

mentor.name: Bear
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice for tests to resist damage (not including drain).
mentor.altdisadvantage: You might go berserk when you take Physical damage in combat or if someone under your care is badly injured. Make a Simple Charisma + Willpower Test (wound modifiers apply). You go berserk for 3 turns minus 1 turn per hit, so 3 or more hits averts the berserk rage entirely. If you’re already going berserk, increase the duration. When you’re berserk, you go after your attacker(s) without regard for your own safety. If you incapacitate the target(s) before the time is up, the berserk fury dissipates.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Health spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Health spells

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Rapid Healing
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Rapid Healing

mentor.name: Cat
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to either Gymnastics or Sneaking Tests (choose one).
mentor.altdisadvantage: Cat magicians toy with their prey. Unless you succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test at the start of combat, you cannot make an attack that incapacitates your target. If you take any Physical damage, all this playing around stops.

choice.name: +2 dice on Gymnastics Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Gymnastics Tests

choice.name: +2 dice on Sneaking Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Sneaking Tests

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Light Body
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Light Body

mentor.name: Dog
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice for Tracking tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A Dog magician is stubbornly loyal. You can never leave someone behind, betray your comrades, or let another sacrifice themselves in your place without making a successful Charisma + Willpower (3) Test.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells

choice.name: Adept: 2 free Improved Sense powers
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free Improved Sense powers

mentor.name: Dragonslayer
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for one social skill of choice.
mentor.altdisadvantage: If you break a promise, whether by choice or by accident, you take a –1 dice pool modifier to all actions until you make good on your promise.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Combat spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Combat spells

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Enhanced Accuracy and Danger Sense
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Enhanced Accuracy and Danger Sense

mentor.name: Eagle
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Perception Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: You get the Allergy (pollutants, mild) quality (p. 322; no bonus Karma for this negative quality).

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of air
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of air

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Combat Sense
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Combat Sense

mentor.name: Fire-Bringer
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Artisan skill tests or Alchemy skill tests (choose one).
mentor.altdisadvantage: When someone sincerely asks you for help, you can’t refuse without succeeding in a Simple Charisma + Willpower (3) Test.

choice.name: +2 dice on Artisan Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Artisan Tests

choice.name: +2 dice on Alchemy Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Alchemy Tests

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Manipulation spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Manipulation spells

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on a non-combat skill
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on a non-combat skill

mentor.name: Mountain
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Survival Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: When a Mountain magician makes a plan, she sticks to it. You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to abandon a planned course of action in favor of a new one. If you fail, you must endeavor to continue with your original plan, even if it means going on alone. Similarly, you must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to proceed in anything withouta plan.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Counterspelling and anchored rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Counterspelling and anchored rituals

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Mystic Armor
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Mystic Armor

mentor.name: Rat
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice for Sneaking Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A Rat magician must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to not immediately flee or seek cover whenever caught in a combat situation. If there is nowhere to flee, she is forced to fight.

choice.name: Magician: +2 to Alchemy for harvesting, and you may use any reagents
choice.translate: Magician: +2 to Alchemy for harvesting, and you may use any reagents

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Natural Immunity
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Natural Immunity

mentor.name: Raven

mentor.altdisadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid exploiting someone else’s misfortune to your own advantage or to pull a clever trick or prank even if it’s to the disadvantage of your friends.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Manipulation spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Manipulation spells

choice.translate: Adept: Free Traceless Walk and 1 level of Voice Control

mentor.altdisadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid exploiting someone else’s misfortune to your own advantage or to pull a clever trick or prank even if it’s to the disadvantage of your friends.

mentor.name: Seducer

mentor.altdisadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid pursuing a vice or indulgence (drugs, BTLs, sex, and so on) when it is made available.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill in the Acting or Inﬂuence skill group
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill in the Acting or Inﬂuence skill group

mentor.name: Shark

mentor.altdisadvantage: You might go berserk when you take Physical damage in combat. Every time it happens, make a Simple Charisma + Willpower Test (wound modifiers apply). You go berserk for 3 turns minus 1 turn per hit, so 3 or more hits averts the berserk rage entirely. If you’re already going berserk, increase the duration. When you’re berserk, you go after your attacker(s) without regard for your own safety. If you run out of targets before the time’s up, you keep attacking their bodies.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Kinesics
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Kinesics

mentor.name: Thunderbird
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice for Intimidation Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A Thunderbird magician must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid responding to an insult in kind.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of air
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of air

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Critical Strike

mentor.altdisadvantage: If you act dishonorably or without courtesy, whether by choice or by accident, you take a –1 dice pool modifier to all actions until you atone for your behavior.

choice.translate: +2 dice for Instruction skill tests

mentor.name: Wolf

mentor.altdisadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to retreat from a fight.

choice.name: Magician:+2 dice for Combat spells
choice.translate: Magician:+2 dice for Combat spells

choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Agility)

mentor.name: Berserker
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Composure Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Berserker’s followers have very short fuses. Whenever someone strongly disagrees with you (gamemaster’s discretion), you must pass a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to keep from striking out against the offender. If the test fails, the attack can be in any form you choose (fist, spell, etc.), but it must have the intent to cause damage.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Physical-type Combat Spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Physical-type Combat Spells

choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Mystic Armor

choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Mystic Armor and Pain Resistance

mentor.name: Chaos
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Con Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: You are an inveterate gossip trying to stir up trouble, especially between friends, and thus cannot keep damaging secrets to yourself. Also, anytime you encounter a public situation deemed too quiet or stable (gamemaster’s discretion), make a Willpower + Intuition (3) Test. Failure means that you are compelled to stir the pot in any way you desire, be it attacking, telling lies, or throwing a drink on someone nearby.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Improved Potential
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Improved Potential

mentor.name: Peacemaker
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Negotiation Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: You see even enemies as potential friends and go out of your way to keep from hurting anyone unless the situation truly warrants it. At the very beginning of combat, you must pass a Charisma + Intuition (3) Test; failure means you are unable to take actions that cause Physical damage for the duration of combat. At the beginning of a new Combat Turn, you may choose to retake the test if you failed the first time and you or a member of your team suffered damage in the previous Combat Turn.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Enhanced Perception
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Enhanced Perception

mentor.name: Oracle
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifier for Arcana Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: You hate mysteries with a passion and can disappear for days trying to track down the answer. When confronted by a particularly haunting question (gamemaster’s discretion), you must take a Willpower + Intuition (3) Test. Failure means you must undertake an Intuition + Logic [Mental] (5, 1 hour) Extended Test to try researching the answer. Completion of the Extended Test does not necessarily mean you found the answer, but it at least silences the question in your mind for the time being. When a follower of Oracle becomes a Grade 1 initiate, she must choose Divination for her first metamagic rather than a Power Point or any other benefit.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells

choice.translate: Adept: Free Astral Perception

mentor.name: Doom
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 to Demolitions or a single Combat Skill
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Doom must succeed in a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to avoid a fight once it has begun, or to not enact a plan to do violence. If they fail, they must engage in combat until all opponents are defeated or flee.

choice.name: +2 to Demolitions
choice.translate: +2 to Demolitions

mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Disease must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to not flee or seek cover whenever in a combat situation, unless they outnumber their opponents. If they begin a fight with greater numbers but then their side is reduced so that they no longer outnumber their opponents, they must make a test to avoid fleeing.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for summoning or binding plague spirits
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for summoning or binding plague spirits

mentor.altdisadvantage: If a follower of Mutation finds themselves inferior to an opponent, they suffer a –1 penalty on all actions until they defeat their rival in that area, or overcome or compensate for the weakness in another way (such as acquiring a new power, spell, or augmentation).

choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Health Spells

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 for Chemistry Tests when dealing with pollutants
mentor.altdisadvantage: If they are in an area cleaner than their normal habitation, followers of Pollution must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test every day. If they fail, they must spend at least eight hours that day actively despoiling the land, regardless of any other plans they had for that time.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for summoning or binding toxic spirits
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for summoning or binding toxic spirits

choice.translate: Adept: Free Toxic Strike

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 to First Aid or Medicine Tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of the Great Mother are lovers and healers, not fighters. As a result, they suffer a –1 dice pool modifier for any combat-related actions (using a combat skill, or casting a spell from the Combat category).

choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Rapid Healing

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to demolitions tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Because of their deep-seated hatred for authority, a teammate’s use of leadership skill is counterproductive to followers of Adversary, invoking either a negative dice penalty or loss of initiative. If the plan doesn’t go the way that the adversary follower wants it to go, it takes a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test for him to get him to cooperate.

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to intimidation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Alligator is stubborn about changing a plan or action to which he is committed. When the rest of the team goes to Plan B, the magician must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test for the magician to stop trying Plan A.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for conjuring spirits of Water or Man (Choose one.)
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for conjuring spirits of Water or Man (Choose one.)

choice.translate: Adept: Free Inertia Strike

mentor.name: Bat
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to navigation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Bat is easily distracted and becomes irritable during enforced inaction. She prefers spontaneity to routine. Every week that the magician stays in the same place, she takes a –1 penalty to all actions until she finds a new place to stay. Also, unless she succeeds in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test, she cannot enter a hangout (bar, club, restaurant) more than once in a week without suffering a –1 to all Magic tests for the next twenty-four hours.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice for conjuring spirits.
choice.translate: Magician: +1 dice for conjuring spirits.

choice.name: Adept: Free motion sense
choice.translate: Adept: Free motion sense

mentor.name: Monkey
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to gymnastics tests involving climbing.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Because Monkey is not an assassin, the magician must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test in order to strike a surprised opponent. Monkey must be able to watch his prank go off or see the look on the opponent’s face after taunting them, otherwise he suffers –1 to all Magic tests until the next sunrise/sunset.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and rituals of the manipulation type.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and rituals of the manipulation type.

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Hang Time.
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Hang Time.

mentor.name: Coyote
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool to all Con tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Coyote has a hard time with head-on attacks or brute force methods, unless it’s part of a larger con or misdirection. Anytime he is forced into such actions, he must make a Willpower + Charisma [Mental] (4) Test. If he fails, then he decides to do things another way, which means he may exit a combat instead of participating in it.

choice.name: Magician: +1 to all Manipulation and Illusion spell tests, preparations, and rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +1 to all Manipulation and Illusion spell tests, preparations, and rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Danger Sense level 2.
choice.translate: Adept: Danger Sense level 2.

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to memory test.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Oak has to succeed in a CHA+WIL (3) test to retreat from a dangerous area instead of waiting till the danger passes.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection spells.

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Mystic Armor.
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Mystic Armor.

mentor.altdisadvantage: If for more than two weeks the Artist fails to find an audience for a presentation of her ability, she has to make a WIL+ CHA (3) test. Should she fail, she fall into depression (-2 dice for every skill linked to LOG, INT or CHA) for 1d6 days. After that (or if she succeeded in the the WIL+CHA test) a new 14 day period begins in which she has to show off her skills.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells.

mentor.altdisadvantage: You have to pass a CHA + WIL (3) check to refrain from instantanously avenging an insult.

mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Dachshund must succeed in a WIL+CHA (3) test, to follow the orders of a leader or a abide to a group decision.

mentor.name: Electro Marten
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Hardware or Electronic Warfare
mentor.altdisadvantage: Electro Marten has problems discerning between different signals. A follower of Electro Marten has to succeed in a CHA + WIL (3) test to not lose himself in the signals or hunt after the wrong one. In stressful situations, he is distracted for 3 combat rounds (minus 1 for each success). If he has no successes, he involuntarily attracts attention in the system.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells.

mentor.altdisadvantage: Whenever a follower of Klabautermann is in danger (in reality or only in his imagination) or he has to stay on or in a vehicle for a prolonged time (be it cars, ships, planes or trains), he must make a CHA+WIL(3) test. Should he fail, he is convinced he saw the Klabautermann, resulting in him running scared and trying to flee, as well as trying to convince other characters that their plans will lead to a bad end.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Detection Spells.

choice.translate: Adept: 2 Free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice for Negotiation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Luna is independent and free. A follower of Luna must pass a CHA+WIL(3) test to follow a direct order that does not correlate to her momentary personal wishes - especially if her own logic tells her that it would be better to disregard her own desires for the moment.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells.

choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of earth

mentor.name: Wolpertinger
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to dodge tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Whenever a follower of Wolpertinger is in danger (in reality or only in his imagination), he has to succeed in a WIL+CHA (3) test to not immediately succumb to his urge to flee.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion Spells.

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Danger Sense.
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.name: Boar
mentor.altadvantage: All: Home Ground Quality is gained for free.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Boar does not like it if there are others intruding in his space or disrupting his routine. At best, the follower protects the bar and employees of the bar he always goes to. At worst, he will start a fight for a specific table or stool that he thinks is his. A warning is optional and usually proffered by the follower’s friends. It takes a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test for a follower of Boar to leave his home, safehouse, or routine permanently, otherwise he will keep coming back, even at the risk of his own safety. If the Boar does leave, he receives a –1 penalty to all active skill tests for three weeks until he finally settles into a new place and routine.

choice.name: Magician: +1 to the number of services gained when successfully summoning a spirit
choice.translate: Magician: +1 to the number of services gained when successfully summoning a spirit

choice.name: Adept: Gains Rooting (2) power for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gains Rooting (2) power for free.

mentor.name: Giraffe
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 Assensing skill tests or +2 to Judge Intentions test (choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Giraffe stumbles through social etiquette, as she believes the small talk and chitchat that are the core of social chatter are fundamentally dishonest and not worthy of her efforts. She can make a wide range of situations awkward and receives –2 dice for Etiquette skill tests.

choice.name: +2 dice on Assensing Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Assensing Tests

choice.name: +2 on Judge Intentions Tests
choice.translate: +2 on Judge Intentions Tests

choice.translate: Magician: +2 to Conjuring skill tests of air spirits

choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Piercing Senses

mentor.name: Dolphin
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice on Artisan skill tests or Pilot Watercraft skill tests (choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers are altruistic when it comes to helping people and cannot turn a blind eye to those who they believe deserve their help. It is difficult for them not to get involved when they see someone being bullied or obviously polluting the environment. If they see such a situation, it takes a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test for a follower of Dolphin not to intervene. If the job that the follower of Dolphin is on involves polluting the environment or becoming the bully/enforcer on those less deserving, then the follower loses 2 dice after each such deed until she atones. Atonement is up to the gamemaster but can involve time and money spent with charities.

choice.name: +2 dice on Artisan tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Artisan tests

choice.name: +2 on Pilot Watercraft Tests
choice.translate: +2 on Pilot Watercraft Tests

choice.name: Adept: Gain Flexibility (2) power for free
choice.translate: Adept: Gain Flexibility (2) power for free

mentor.name: Whale
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Swimming or Pilot Watercraft skill tests (choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: Because of their personal sense of ethics, followers of the whale must honor any agreement they enter into. This can be an oath to an organization or a verbal contract with a corporation. Failing to honor the contract or oath results in a loss of a point of Magic. The Whale mentor spirit understands if circumstances to complete the contract are out of the Awakened’s hands. For everything else, the follower can attempt to atone, but at the gamemaster’s discretion.

choice.name: +2 dice on Swimming tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Swimming tests

choice.translate: +2 on Pilot Watercraft Tests

choice.translate: Adept: Receive 2 ranks in Iron Lungs or free.

mentor.name: Horse
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Running or Pilot Ground Craft tests (choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of the Horse can’t sit still for long nor be confined indoors. They must spend at least four hours a day outside and be able to run or drive around (any method of travel faster than walking). If followers are not able to meet this condition, they suffer –1 die to all action skill tests. This penalty is cumulative, meaning if the follower is stuck at a desk all day (indoors and not moving around) for two days in a a row, they suffer –2 to all actions until they get that free time in.

choice.name: +2 dice on Running tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Running tests

choice.name: +2 on Pilot Ground Craft Tests
choice.translate: +2 on Pilot Ground Craft Tests

choice.translate: Magician: Reduce Drain Value from Reckless Summoning by 1

choice.translate: Adept: May learn to use the Movement critter power as a metamagic (self only, 3 times a day)

mentor.name: Raccoon
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 to Palming skill tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: The Raccoon is commonly one of the Thief totems, so the followers can tend to err on the side of greed. A follower of Raccoon must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to resist the urge to open that next locked door to look for something to steal, or to follow that Matrix rabbit trail in the quest for more paydata.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals in the Manipulation category.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals in the Manipulation category.

choice.name: Adept: 2 Improved Sense powers
choice.translate: Adept: 2 Improved Sense powers

mentor.name: Spider
mentor.altadvantage: All:+2 dice to Computer skill tests
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Spider are already paranoid about people having any misconceptions about them being insect shamans. They will keep such detailsfrom casual conversation. Followers of Spider also have taken advantage of the Matrix more than more traditional shamas in creating connections. This makes followers more agoraphobic as they avoid uncontrolled social situations and unfamiliar environments. They receive a –1 dice pool modifier to Magic tests while out in the open (this includes very large indoor rooms such as auditoriums, theatres, and stadiums). The penalty doubles if there is a large crowd of people to deal with.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion spells

choice.name: Adept: Hang time (2)
choice.translate: Adept: Hang time (2)

mentor.name: Goddess
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Instruction Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: The Goddess refuses to take a backseat to any male counterparts. Unless you succeed in a Charisma + Willpower Test (3), you will not take orders from a male, or if a male disrespects you, you must respond with equal measure

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Ritual Spellcasting Tests
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Ritual Spellcasting Tests

choice.name: Adept: 1 free level of Authoritative Tone
choice.translate: Adept: 1 free level of Authoritative Tone

mentor.name: Lion
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Survival Tests, Running Tests, or Tracking Tests (Choose One)
mentor.altdisadvantage: In combat situations, a Lion will never leave a comrade behind, and will fght to the death to protect an ally. Unless you succeed in a Charisma + Willpower Test (3), you cannot ﬂee combat before your team members are safe. Further, whenever taking actions that don’t beneft the team somehow, your physical and mental limits are reduced by 2.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice to Combat spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice to Combat spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Strength)
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Strength)

mentor.name: Raven (Alt)
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for knowledge skill tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Raven share their mentor’s love of collecting. When presented with data, knowledge, or other gear that would be valuable (gamemaster’s discretion), you must pass a Charisma + Willpower Test (3), or be unable to resist trying to acquiring it.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice to Detection spells, preparations, and rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice to Detection spells, preparations, and rituals.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice to summoning spirits if summoner also has Code of Honor: Harmony with Nature, The Shaman’s Code and bargains with the summoned spirit.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice to summoning spirits if summoner also has Code of Honor: Harmony with Nature, The Shaman’s Code and bargains with the summoned spirit.

choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Enhanced Perception.

mentor.name: Dove
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Negotiation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Dove discourages combat whenever possible. As such, those who follow Dove are at –2 dice pool modifer to cast Combat spells or when using lethal force.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer for casting Health spells, +1 dice pool modifer to summon air spirits
choice.translate: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer for casting Health spells, +1 dice pool modifer to summon air spirits

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Enhanced Perception.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Enhanced Perception.

mentor.name: Planar Entity
mentor.altadvantage: All: Determined by spirit type and gamemaster approval.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Taking on an extraplanar entity into one’s soul is not without its drawbacks. Much of their mental ability is taken up keeping themselves from losing their identity as a result of their shared existence. Mages suffer a –2 dice pool penalty when making tests involving Willpower

choice.name: Magician: Determined by spirit type and gamemaster approval.

mentor.name: Arcana
mentor.altadvantage: All: Once per day, when making a decision or test inﬂuenced by a Tarot reading/card, may re-roll misses as if they had used Edge.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of the Arcana must use Tarot decks or individual cards as foci and fetishes, or else take –2 when attempting to use them. The Tarot Arcana plays such a major part in the lives of its adherents that when a follower of Arcana becomes a grade 1 initiate, they must choose centering or adept centering for their frst beneft, with the cards of Tarot being the focus of their centering.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer for casting Detection spells, an additional +2 dice pool modifer to cast Clairvoyance spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer for casting Detection spells, an additional +2 dice pool modifer to cast Clairvoyance spells.

choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense

mentor.name: Holy Text
mentor.altadvantage: Gain +4 ranks of (Choose Holy Text) Knowledge Skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: When a follower of a Holy Text wishes to take an action that is contrary to the teaching of the text (whatever that text is), they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test to take the action.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when using the Banishing skill.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when using the Banishing skill.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Health spells.

mentor.name: Death
mentor.altadvantage: All: +4 ranks of the Knowledge Skill Anatomy, Disease, Infected, or Undead (choose one).
mentor.altdisadvantage: In order for a follower of Death to attempt to help someone who is dying or injured, they must first pass a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting the spells Death Touch, Manaball, Manabolt, One Less, Slaughter, Slay.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting the spells Death Touch, Manaball, Manabolt, One Less, Slaughter, Slay.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Killing Hands or Plague Cloud (choose one).

mentor.name: War
mentor.altadvantage: All: After character creation, may purchase combat skills at rank 3 or higher for 1 less Karma
mentor.altdisadvantage: If it looks as if they are going to lose a battle, those with the War mentor must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test, or else use all means necessary—including the lives, nuyen, and honor of their teammates—to overcome their adversary.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Critical Strike.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Critical Strike.

mentor.name: Tohu Wa-Bohu
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Intimidation or Demolitions tests (choose one)
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers gain the Driven quality, in which the focus is the opportunity to destroy something meaningful. Further, they fnd it hard to work in groups given their destructive nature. They can never beneft from teamwork or leadership bonuses.

choice.name: Magician: Gain the Witness My Hate quality for free.
choice.translate: Magician: Gain the Witness My Hate quality for free.

choice.name: Adept: Gain the Adept Accident power for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain the Adept Accident power for free.

mentor.name: Green Man
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Negotiation Tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: When signifcant damage is being done to vegetation, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test or use all means possible to stop the destruction.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer to summon Plant Spirits.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer to summon Plant Spirits.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Rooting.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Rooting.

mentor.name: Sun
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Perception tests when outside during the day.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Sun must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test in order to purposefully deceive others.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Sun- or Fire-based spells.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Sun- or Fire-based spells.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 3 free levels of Temperature Tolerance
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 3 free levels of Temperature Tolerance

mentor.name: Dark King
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Intimidation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers receive a –1 dice pool penalty when resisting physical damage.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice to Contractual Rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice to Contractual Rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Gain Spirit Ram for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain Spirit Ram for free.

mentor.name: Moon
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice to Negotiation tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Moon must make a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test in order to engage in direct confrontation; failure means they cannot make any action considered as such. Negotiation is not considered confrontation (Moon loves discussion), but arguments fall into that category.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion and transformation-focused Manipulation spells, preparations, and spell rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion and transformation-focused Manipulation spells, preparations, and spell rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 3 levels of Stillness for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 3 levels of Stillness for free.

mentor.name: Oak
mentor.altadvantage: All: +1 to Damage Resistance tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Must have a natural (meaning unaugmented) Body and Strength of 4 or greater to select this mentor spirit.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool bonus when summoning plant or air spirits (choose 1 when selecting this mentor spirit).
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool bonus when summoning plant or air spirits (choose 1 when selecting this mentor spirit).

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 levels of Stillness for free
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 levels of Stillness for free

mentor.name: Stag
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 to Blades tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of the Stag demand respect, especially to those they give it to. Once disrespected, they must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test, or they will demand satisfaction against the slight.

choice.name: Magician: +2 to summoning earth spirits.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 to summoning earth spirits.

choice.name: Adept: Gain +2 levels of Light Body for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain +2 levels of Light Body for free.

mentor.name: Great Mother
mentor.altadvantage: All: When not in an urban area, gain +1 to any skill test with skills in the Outdoors skill group.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Treat any background count due to pollution or twisted element as twice the actual rating.

choice.name: Magician: +2 for health spells, preparations, and spell rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 for health spells, preparations, and spell rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Gain Empathic Healing for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain Empathic Healing for free.

mentor.name: Spider (Alt)
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Stealth skill group.
mentor.altdisadvantage: When not following a plan or a plan doesn’t go according to plan, followers of Spider must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or suffer –2 to all rolls until a new plan is established.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Spirit Claw (although in this case, it manifests as a fang).
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Spirit Claw (although in this case, it manifests as a fang).

mentor.name: Wolf (Alt)
mentor.altadvantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Sneaking, Perception, Survival, and Tracking skills.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Whenever a follower of Wolf sees an opportunity to survive by attacking or sacrifcing the weak, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or attempt to seize the opportunity. This does not apply to those the Wolf considers friends or family.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
choice.translate: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.name: Rat (Alt)
mentor.altadvantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Sneaking skills.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Rat cannot receive aid or aid others with a Teamwork test unless they trust the individuals they are teaming with. Further, if they do trust the individuals, but that trust is broken through incompetence or betrayal, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test to be able to use teamwork with that individual each time in the future.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Health spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Health spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Analytics.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Analytics.

mentor.name: Eurasian Jay
mentor.altadvantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Palming skills.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Eurasian Jay loves to split his posessions. If a follower of Eurasian Jay receives a splittable reward, she must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test to not spread the reward over different accounts or rooms.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Voice Control.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Voice Control.

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.name: Squirrel
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Gymnastics skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: When followers of Squirrel are in confined spaces, they must make a Willpower + Chrisma (3) Tests or take a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests while feeling cramped.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Light Body.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Light Body.

mentor.name: Fox
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: If Fox fights, it'll fight to kill. A follower of this mentor spirit must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to spare a bettered foe.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Combat Sense.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Combat Sense.

mentor.name: Tide
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Ritual Spellcasting skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Followers of Tide live in transition, but in the consistency of a cycle. They also design their lives this way. If their normal life cycle is lastingly impaired by Sleep deprivation or illness, they suffer a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests until the cycle is restored.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water or earth (The type of spirit for which this bonus applies changes every 6 hours).
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water or earth (The type of spirit for which this bonus applies changes every 6 hours).

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Heightened Concentration.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Heightened Concentration.

mentor.name: Heinzelmännchen
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Artisan skill and the Engineering skill group.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Heinzelmännchen works in secret. If a follower of Heinzelmännchen wants to perform magic in public or under close observation, they'll have to make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test or else their magic cease to function for the moment.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability (Artisan or a skill from the Engineering group).
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability (Artisan or a skill from the Engineering group).

mentor.name: Groundhog
mentor.altadvantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Etiquette skills.
mentor.altdisadvantage: If a follower of Grounghog get into a fight (intentionally or unintentionally), they'll have to make a Willpower + Chraisma (3) Test to not flee immediately.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Reaction).
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Reaction).

choice.name: Adept: Gain the Motion Sense power for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain the Motion Sense power for free.

mentor.name: Seal
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Judge Intentions tests.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Seal has compassion, but she is lacking in tact dealing with the feelings of others. Whenever a follower of Seal gains insight into the emotional world of an other, it's difficult for him to respect private boundaries and not address the subject. In order to remain discreet in such situations, they must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test. Glitches in social test are automatically critical.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain the Astral Perception Power for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain the Astral Perception Power for free.

mentor.name: Pig
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Con skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of Pig must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to break free from pleasurable activities like sleeping, eating, drinking or consuming drugs.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals

choice.name: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill from the Influence or Acting group.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill from the Influence or Acting group.

mentor.name: Capricorn
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Gymnastics skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: Capricorn may not be stubborn, but he decides and acts quickly. He has neither tolerance nor time for hesitation. If a follower of Capricorn is confronted with long decision-making processes, discussions, or indecision, he must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test in order not to immediately choose the in his opinion best decision available and to put it into practice immediately.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of earth.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of earth.

choice.name: Adept: 2 free levels of Hang Time.
choice.translate: Adept: 2 free levels of Hang Time.

mentor.name: Wild Hunt
mentor.altadvantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Pilot Ground Craft or Intimidation skill.
mentor.altdisadvantage: A follower of the Wild Hunt always leaves behind a swath of devastation. If objects or uninvolved persons could be harmed in the fight, he wouldn't take any consideration. If a follower of the Wild Hunt is consciously considerate in the fight, he must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) test, otherwise he is so inhibited that he suffers a -2 dicepool modifier on all actions.

choice.name: +2 dice on Pilot Ground Craft Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Pilot Ground Craft Tests

choice.name: +2 dice on Intimidation Tests
choice.translate: +2 dice on Intimidation Tests

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of man.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of man.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning guardian spirits.
choice.translate: Magician: +2 dice summoning guardian spirits.

choice.name: Adept: Gain the Berserk power for free.
choice.translate: Adept: Gain the Berserk power for free.
